image.title: Multilingual
image.description: Cytoscape supports languages other than English, including East Asian languages.

image.title: Custom Graphics
image.description: You can add any type of bitmap images on the nodes.

image.title: Scalable
image.description: Cytoscape can load and visualize large scale network data.

image.title: Alpha Blending
image.description: Transparency is supported for all graph objects.

image.title: VizMapper
image.description: You can easily map attribute values to visual properties, such as colors or size.

image.title: Many Plugins
image.description: Lots of plugins are developed by 3rd party.
